name: Men's "Lord of the Manor" cushion
description:
Stuck when it comes to make a present for the man in your life (or your dad, brother or boss)?These two heraldic themed cushions sold separately, are ideal men’s gifts. They are 40x40, handmade appliqué coat of arms on wool. Made with felt, antique buttons, ribbons, military patches and chains, they are unique and will please any man with a taste for history. Make sure you indicate which one of the two you want to purchase (roses or leaves). 
These cushions have been treated with textile sealant to prevent stains and dirt. 
Don't hesitate to contact me if you'd like to personalise your cushion with initials or symbols of your choice to make it extra special.

name: Retro Sewing Set
description: Set of 3 items, including one zipped 19cm x 14cm sewing bag, one 8cm x 8 cm x 4cm foam pin cushion and one 15cm x 8 cm needle book. Black and white sewing equipment design on cotton, white felt and snap fastener for needle book. Just the right thing for any sewing enthusiast. Please see my listings to purchase the items separately. Pins, needles and accessories are not included. Ideal gift for yourself or anybody you want to encourage taking up sewing. Will be sent in a gift cello bag.

name: Retro felt ball ring
description: Retro needle felting wool ball. Approximately 3 cm in diameter mounted on an adjustable silver metal ring. Embellished with beads sewn throughout. Stunning and unique, this design will make people talk. The technique of needle felting is not usually associated with jewellery making and by buying this item you'll be sure to get something totally original.

name: Note Book
description:
10.5cmx15cmx1.5cm note book. Blank cream pages.
Hand-bounded with B/W Toile de Jouy. Baroque frame/Carnet de Notes print. The print may vary from the picture.

name: Forty Winks gift bag – Sleep mask and earplug bag/Pink
description:
Beautiful sleep mask made with genuine Toile de Jouy, satin backing, matching stretch velvet and light blocking lining. 
The bag contains a pair of ear plugs, ideal for earphones, lip balm, pill box. 
Great gift for afternoon naps, restful nights, home, office, hospital, planes, trains and automobiles, summer nights, bright lights. Sold in gift cello bag. 
Available in a variety of Toiles de Jouy and retro prints. Please visit our website for more info or contact us.
